performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
The panel did not feel that enthusiasm for teaching or your subject came across sufficiently at interview, and some of your responses were quite limited. Your written response to the question task showed a development of the links between RE and the decisions we make in our lives, but this was not developed in your interview responses.  
More evidence of research into the RE curriculum and also the teacher standards, including Fundamental British Values and upholding public trust in the profession. We would also recommend you familiarise yourself in more detail with the principles of safeguarding and child protection.
